IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. params._factory: The address of the factory to add

params.params: The parameters for building the position based on the ShivaStructs.Build struct

returns._0: The ID of the newly created position

params.onBehalfOf: The parameters for building on behalf of a user based on the ShivaStructs.OnBehalfOf struct
params.params: The parameters for building the position based on the ShivaStructs.Build struct

returns._0: The ID of the newly created position

buildSingle((address,uint32,uint16,uint2.details: If the user already has a position in the ovMarket, it will be unwound before building a new one and previous collateral and new collateral will be used to build the new position

params.params: The parameters for building the single position based on the ShivaStructs.BuildSingle struct

returns._0: The ID of the newly created position

buildSingle((address,uint32,uint16,uint2.details: Only callable when the contract is not paused, the deadline is valid, and the caller is the owner of the previous position

params.onBehalfOf: The parameters for building on behalf of a user based on the ShivaStructs.OnBehalfOf struct
params.params: The parameters for building the single position based on the ShivaStructs.BuildSingle struct

returns._0: The ID of the newly created position
The digest of the typed data hash

params._ovState: The address of the Overlay V1 State contract
params._ovToken: The address of the Overlay V1 Token contract
params._vaultFactory: The address of the Berachain Rewards Vault Factory contract

overlayMarketLiquidateCallback(uint256).details: Only callable by a valid market

params.positionId: The ID of the position to liquidate

pause().details: Only callable by an address with the pauser role

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate that the this implementation remains valid after an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params._factory: The address of the factory to remove

unpause().details: Only callable by an address with the pauser role

unwind((address,uint32,uint256,uint256,u.details: Only callable when the contract is not paused and the caller is the owner of the position

params.params: The parameters for unwinding the position based on the ShivaStructs.Unwind struct

unwind((address,uint32,uint256,uint256,u.details: Only callable when the contract is not paused, the deadline is valid, and the caller is the owner of the position

params.onBehalfOf: The parameters for unwinding on behalf of a user based on the ShivaStructs.OnBehalfOf struct
params.params: The parameters for unwinding the position based on the ShivaStructs.Unwind struct

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

addFactory(address).notice: Adds a new factory to the list of authorized factories

build((address,uint32,bool,uint256,uint2.notice: Builds a position in the ovMarket for a user
Builds a position on behalf of a user (with signature verification)

buildSingle((address,uint32,uint16,uint2.notice: Builds and keeps a single position in the ovMarket for a user
Builds and keeps a single position on behalf of a user (with signature verification)

emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256,addres.notice: Withdraws all the collateral from a position in a shutdown market

getDigest(bytes32).notice: Returns the digest of the typed data hash

marketAllowance(address).notice: Mapping to check if a market is allowed to spend OV on behalf of this contract

nonces(address).notice: Mapping from performer address to nonce

pause().notice: Pauses the contract, preventing certain actions

positionOwners(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from market and position ID to the address of the position owner

removeFactory(address).notice: Removes a factory from the list of authorized factories

unpause().notice: Unpauses the contract, allowing actions to be performed

unwind((address,uint32,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Unwinds a position for the user
Unwinds a position on behalf of a user (with signature verification)

validMarkets(address).notice: Mapping to check if an address is a valid market
